Class User

java.lang.Object
User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Customer, Seller
public class User extends Object
Template class for all Users (both Sellers and Customers). Stores elementary details about a user.

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User(String userString, boolean hasDetails)
      Parses a User object's String and instantiates User fields to their values.

      Possible userString values dependent on memory:
      hasDetails == false => toString()
      hasDetails == true => Seller.detailedToString() / Customer.detailedToString()
      Parameters:
      userString - A User String
      hasDetails - Whether the User String is detailed (i.e. it contains blocked user, invisible user, and censored words)
      See Also:
      • toString()
      • Seller.detailedToString()
      • Seller.detailedToStringWithoutStores()
      • Customer.detailedToString()

    • User

      public User(String username, String email, String password)
      Creates a new User object with provided parameters.
      Parameters:
      username - The name of the seller
      email - The email of the seller
      password - The password of the seller

    • isParticipantOf

      public boolean isParticipantOf(Conversation conversation)
      Checks whether this user is a participant of the parameter conversation
      Parameters:
      conversation - The conversation of which this user is or is not a participant of
      Returns:
      Returns the whether this user is a participant of the parameter conversation independent of the role

    • updateAccountsFile

      public void updateAccountsFile(PrintWriter writer, String oldString, String newString)
      Sends network request to update passwords.txt
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      oldString - The old String that is to be replaced by newString
      newString - The new String that is to replace oldString

    • updateConversationsFile

      public void updateConversationsFile(PrintWriter writer, String oldString, String newString)
      Sends network request to update conversations.txt
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      oldString - The old String that is to be replaced by newString
      newString - The new String that is to replace oldString

    • setUsername

      public void setUsername(BufferedReader reader, PrintWriter writer, String username)
      Mutator method that changes the username to the parameter username. Sends request to update all files for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      reader - The BufferedReader object to be used to read network responses
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      username - The new username

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(BufferedReader reader, PrintWriter writer, String password)
      Mutator method that changes the password to the parameter password. Sends request to update all files for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      reader - The BufferedReader object to be used to read network responses
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      password - The new password

    • toggleRequestsCensorship

      public void toggleRequestsCensorship(PrintWriter writer)
      Mutator method that toggles the status of whether the user wants to censor messages. Sends request to update passwords.txt and conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request

    • addBlockedUser

      public void addBlockedUser(PrintWriter writer, User blockedUser)
      Mutator method that adds a new User to this user's list of blocked users. Sends request to update passwords.txt and conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      blockedUser - The new User to be added to this user's list of blocked users

    • removeBlockedUser

      public void removeBlockedUser(PrintWriter writer, User blockedUser)
      Mutator method that removes the parameter User from this user's list of blocked users. Sends request to update passwords.txt and conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      blockedUser - The User to be removed from this user's list of blocked users

    • addInvisibleUser

      public void addInvisibleUser(PrintWriter writer, User invisibleUser)
      Mutator method that adds a new User to this user's list of users this user is invisible to. Sends request to update passwords.txt and conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      invisibleUser - The new User to be added to this user's list of users this User is invisible to

    • removeInvisibleUser

      public void removeInvisibleUser(PrintWriter writer, User invisibleUser)
      Mutator method that removes the parameter User from this user's list of users this user is invisible to. Sends request to update passwords.txt and conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      invisibleUser - The User to be removed from this user's list of users this User is invisible to

    • addCensoredWord

      public void addCensoredWord(PrintWriter writer, String censoredWord)
      Mutator method that adds a new censored word pair to this user's list of censored word pairs. Sends request to update passwords.txt and conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      censoredWord - The new censored word pair to be added to this user's list of censored word pairs

    • removeCensoredWord

      public void removeCensoredWord(PrintWriter writer, int index, String censoredWord)
      Mutator method that removes the parameter censored word pair from this user's list of censored word pairs. Sends request to update passwords.txt and conversations.txt for later retrieval.
      Parameters:
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      index - The index of the censored word pair to be removed in the user's list of censored word pairs
      censoredWord - The censored word pair to be removed from this user's list of censored word pairs

    • sendMessageToUser

      public boolean sendMessageToUser(BufferedReader reader, PrintWriter writer, String message, User user)
      Sends a message to the parameter user ONLY IF this user is not blocked by the parameter user. Creates a new conversation if one does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      reader - The BufferedReader object to be used to read network responses
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      message - The message content of the message to be sent
      user - The user to which the message is being sent
      Returns:
      Returns whether the message was sent successfully

    • editMessage

      public boolean editMessage(BufferedReader reader, PrintWriter writer, Message message, Conversation conversation, String newMessage)
      Edits a message in the parameter conversation and changes the message content to the parameter newMessage ONLY IF the sender of the message is this user.
      Parameters:
      reader - The BufferedReader object to be used to read network responses
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      message - The Message object that is to be edited (message content changes)
      conversation - The Conversation object whose file is read and rewritten with the edited message
      newMessage - The new edited message content
      Returns:
      Returns whether the message was edited successfully

    • deleteMessage

      public boolean deleteMessage(BufferedReader reader, PrintWriter writer, Message message, Conversation conversation)
      Deletes a message in the parameter conversation by changing the message's sender visibility status or recipient visibility status depending on this user and the parameter conversation.
      Parameters:
      reader - The BufferedReader object to be used to read network responses
      writer - The PrintWriter object to be used to send the network request
      message - The Message object that is to be deleted (message visibility changes according to the user)
      conversation - The Conversation object whose file is read and rewritten with the edited message
      Returns:
      Returns whether the message was deleted successfully

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object o)
      Checks the equality of two User objects. Compares only EMAIL since it is the only constant.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - Object to be compared with
      Returns:
      Returns whether the equality condition was met

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Generates a formatted String of the User containing elementary identification details.

      General format:
      User<username, EMAIL, password>
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      Returns the User object's String

    • csvToString

      public String csvToString()
      Generates a formatted String of the User containing only the required details for CSV conversion. (i.e. does not contain sensitive information like passwords)

      General format:
      EMAIL
      Returns:
      Returns the User object's String for CSV conversion
